column5: Dmitri Galitzine set a new speed record for the fastest 100m paddle in a pumpkin boat. The contemporary artist celebrated after setting the world record at Trafalgar Wharf in Portsmouth by paddling the distance in two minutes flat. Galitzine is now planning to cross the Solent from Portsmouth to the Isle of Wight in a giant gourd powered by an outboard motor.   Nothing short of Amazing ...wouldnt you say?  Happy Friday
Try mounting a downrigger on that sucker..
thats what i was thinking ...then Brian and his belly boat came to mind...lol...
